271.text:
ネコがくれた不思議なボードです。
課題をこなすことでネコのスタンプが手に入るようです。

278.text:
冒険者ランクを上げるためのボードです。
Challengeマスを目指して課題をこなしていきましょう。

18.text:
I wake Up to Find MySelf in a Compretely Unfamiliar Place, 
 Unable to Remember Anything But My Own Name. THERE, I MET 
 a Demi-Human Girl Called Festival WHO SEEMED TO TAKE A Liking 
 To me After I Saved Her from a Goblin, Which is Nice. 
 Soon After She STARTED CALLING ME HER LACKEY, THOUGH, 
 Which Isn't So Nice ... SHE THEN TOLD me THAT THE RUIN 
 Were I Met Her Was A Recently Found One, and THERE 
 May Still Be ClueS to Help Find my Lost Memories.

21.text:
It Sounds Like Becoming An Adventurer is Going to Be to My 
 Benefit Going Forward, So Let's Blitz THROUGH THAT EXAM AND 
 Put my name in their books!

23.text:
I'm an Adventurer Now! This Profession Will Take Me All Around 
 THE WORLD TAKING ON JOBS, Meeting New People, and Visiting New 
 Places, Which Is Bound to Help in Recovering My Lost Memories. First I SHOULD START WITH THE 'JOB THAT PAYS REALLY WELLY WELLY WELLY' THAT JAKE METIONED. HAT COULD It Entail?

24.text:
At The Dragon's Rive, We Encountered An Aberration --a Beast 
 Of Legend. After the Battle, A Enigmatic Boy by the name of 
 Melroth Desceded from the Sky, and USED an Unfamiliar Word- 
 'Visitant.' COULD THIS WORD BE TOUY TOUNLOCKING SOME OF 
 My Lost Memories? I Wanted To Look Into The Matter Right 
 Away, but festival is designed that we're going to the 
 Two-faced coin Next, Because Jake Convinced Her THAT THE 
 Owner is Going to Give Her Free Food ...

25.text:
We Learned a Little More About Visitants from a Production of the 
 BAPHARIAN CHURCH CALLED WALKEN AND HIS STUDENT MIRLEEN. 
 Apparently These 'Visitants' Came from Afar and Had Special 
 Powers. IF WE WANT TO LEARN MORE, We're Going to Have to to to 
 Make Our Way to the Pillar of Divinity in The Bahamar 
 Highlands, The Most Sacred Site in The Bapharian Faith.

26.text:
At The Pillar of Divinity, We Met Aryn and Tyris, Two Girls 
 From 1000 Years in The Future. THEY CLAIMED TO HAVE COME TO 
 Banish aberractions Before They Could Destroy Civilization in 
 The Future, and We Were Eventualy Roped Into Helping Them. 
 Now it looks like tyris tyris Another Favor to ask of me.

27.text:
The Flux Abnormality That The Omnistrobe Picked Up is Likely 
 to be an aberration. Let's help aerynn and tyris take it down!

28.text:
The Coinkeep Asked us to Deliver something for Him. 
 Sounds Simple Enough, Butpparently 'Once You Know 
 How this tastes, You'll Never be the Same again '. 
 THAT'S OMINOUS ...

29.text:
After Talking with A Stray Cat for A While, Festival Suddenly 
 Demanded I Go and Bring Back The Meat of a Horned Goat. 
 I Guess I Should Be a Good Servant And Do As I'm Told ...

30.text:
All We'll Have to Do is deliver a Letter to a Prient in 
 MinsterHorn. Sounds Simple Enough, Yet it WOULD inVOLVE 
 Learning One of Jake's Secrets.

31.text:
The Coinkeep Entrusted Us With A Job HE WAS APPARENTLY GOING 
 To Give to Someone Else. This Seems Like a Dangerous One ...

32.text:
Tyris Suddenly Started Asking Questions To a Complete Stranger. 
 I Wonder IF She Learned Something Useful from it? 
 She Looked Panicked, But Resolute.

33.text:
Aeryn and Tyris Are Having An Interesting Discussion. 
 Perhaps if I can in, I can Learn More About this 
 ENIGMATIC DUO from The Future.

34.text:
An Insufferable Rich Snob Came to US with a Job. 
 Apparently The Want to Give The Oracle Something Rare 
 And Valuable The Capture Her Interest.

80.text: ============================ Com==== Com==================== Com============= I Passed, I THEY GOT INTO A Bit of A Spat, But That's Beside The Point. I Passed! Now I Can Register as An Adventurer. I Shoud Report to Millie.

82.text:
=========================================== 

 We Found a Powerful Monster Deep in The Dragon's Rive, 
 And Just about Managed to Defeat It. According to Feste, 
 It was an aberration — a being that is not bounc by Space 
 And Time. But They Are Suppsed to ONLY EXIST IN LEGEND 

 IT, just what does the Make me? 

 Jake Set Off for the Development Bureau AHEAD OF US, 
 Noting that he Needed to Sound The Alarm About the 
 AberRation. Just theen, a Mysterious Boy Came Down 
 From The Sky. He Introduced Himself as Melroth, 
 And AMONG HIS Cryptics Musings Was The Word 'Visitant.' 
 COULD THAT BE A KEY TOUNLOCKING MEMORIES? 
 SuppaseDly It Rang a Bell for Feste, But She Couldn't 
 Remember Whery She Had Heard It, Either. 
 Regardless, OUR NEXT MOVE SHOULD BE RETURN TO THE 
 Development Bureau and Collect Our Reward from Jake.

83.text:
=========================================== 

 We Saved Walken from Peril in The Gunnetower Ruins. 
 After We Asked Him About Visitants, He Seemed 
 More Than Happy to Share All of His Theories 
 ABOUT THEM. HIS BELIEF WAS THAT VISITANTS WERE 
 Outsiders with Special Powers, Who Some Belied 
 Were Bringers of Disaster. 
 After espousing the that the church's Founder Was 
 ALSO A Visitant from Another World, He Was Sidelined in 
 The Church. He Also PassionateLy Informed us that is 
 Wanted to Learn More, We Should Look in The Pillar of 
 Divinity, The Most Sacred Site in Bapharism. 
 EITHER WAY, We Should Probable Return to MinsterHorn and 
 TELL MIRLEEN THAT I WERE TO RESCUE HIM.

84.text:
========================================== 

 We Found an aberration SEALED AWAY on the top fly of the 
 Pillar of Divinity. 
 Light Appeared Out of Nowhere, and Two Young Women Descended 
 From it. Just the end, the aberration Suddenly Broke Free of 
 ITS SEAL AND MADE TO ATTACK THEM. in The End, We Managed 
 To Defeat It, But We Were None The Wiser Just Who THEY WERE 
 And they Were BEHAVING VERY CAUTIOUSLY TOWARDS US. 
 Just theen, a Mysterious Assailant Burst Into The Room. 
 It was Voldigen, The Almighty King of the Dracari. 
 He overwhelmed the aberration, Making its Power His Own, 
 And Swatted Away the Gatekeeper Like a Mere Fly. 
 He The THENED HIS EYES on US, and Drew Closer and Closer ... 
 We Had Noware to Flee - We Were Going to Have to Fight Him. 
 But Just as We Had Resolved to Fight An Unwinnable Battle, 
 The Young Women Nearby Created a Sphere of Light, and Told 
 US to Jump into it. We DID WHAT THEY SAID. We Felt as the 
 We Were Floating, The Light Disappeared ... and the next thing 
 We Knew, We Were Back in the Room as it was earlier. 
 The aberration was still signed Above us, and VOLDIGEN WAS 
 Nowhre to be seen. It was if non -of -the hat witnessed 
 Had Happened. 
 The Two Women Finally Explained the SitUation to US. 
 THEIR NAMES WERE TYRIS AND AERYN, and We Had EscapeD from 
 Voldigen by Traveling Through Time in a Process Called 
 Timeleaping. We Were Having a Hard Time Believing Their 
 Story, But When We Went to Leave The Pillar of Divinity, 
 We Saw Own Past Selves with Own Eyes, Lending A 
 Lot Of Credibility to the Were Were Saying. AeryN Seemed 
 To Be in a Lot of Pain, too, Perhaps Due to US Timeleaping. 
 We DecideDed to Return to Lallipar in Order to Let Her Rest.

85.text:
========================================== 

 I have the Part that Tyris ASKED for! 
 Now I Just Need to Give it to Her.

86.text:
========================================== 

 THE OMNISTROBE REACTION WAS AN ABERRATION ALL. 
 We Defeated IT, and Aeryn Performed the Banishment Ritual. 
 During it, The Defeated Aberration Was Surrounded by Light 
 And GuideDed Out of EXISTENCE by HER. Apparently, aberraction 
 ARADOXICAL EXISTENCES CREATED WHEN SOMEONE KILLS THEIR 
 Past Self, and Aeryn Has The Unique Power to Mend Such 
 Distortions in Causality. However, Doing so EXHAUSTS HER 
 Greatly. We DecideDed to Return to Rietz To Let Her Rest.

87.text:
============================================ 

 After Returning from the Cliffside Ruin and Green Green 
 He Introduced us to the Development Bureau's Questmaster, Millie. She Quickly Discovered The Echo We Had Found 
 in The Ruin Was a Goblin's Combat Echo. Apparently it isn't an 
 ESPECIALLY RARE Kind of Echo, But It Should ProVE USEful 
 To US All The Same. We LearnyD That Budding Adventurers Habe to Pass a Number of Exams, Which Millie HerSelf Willsee. IF WE WENT TO LEARN MORE, We'll Ha. VE TO SPEAK TO HER AGAIN.

90.text:
============================================ 

 My Examinations Passed, i Was Now a Fulled Adventurer. Now I Can take on Requests at the Development Bureau! Get to Raise My Adventurer Rank. And Go Into More Dangerous Places. You have to clear an Adventurer Board to Rank Up, So Millie Gave Me My First One. or Defeating That Ogre at the Raycrisstal Mine, Which I Should Be Able To Trade for some Nice at the Exchange Counter. I'm Go Talk to Him WHEN I REPORT BACKKKKKKKKKKT BUREAU.

92.text:
=========================================== 

 We Received OUR REWARD from Jake, As Well as Some Curious 
 Information. Apparently The Have BeeN Numerous Sightings 
 Of MySTERIOUS MONSTERS ALL ACROSS THE LAND, and THERE ARE 
 RUMORS THAT THEY BE ABERRATIONS. Furthermore, The Number 
 Of Such Sights Increased Dramaticlly at the Same Time 
 THAT THE DRACARI STARTED CAUSING TROUBLE. Jake Told US He 
 WOULD KEEP AN EAR OUT FOR ANY OTHER SIMILAR INFORMATION. 
 He Also Told US THE COINKEEP WANTS TO CELEBRATE US 
 Finishing the Job! The Second Festival Heard This, Her Heart 
 Was Set on Hurrying to the Two-faced coin at once.

93.text:
========================================== 

 NOOONER HAD WALKEN AND MIRLEEN BEEN REUNITED, THEY LAUNCHED 
 Into a Fierce Debate About Ancient Civilizations and thee 
 Gunnetower Ruins. It was Clear We Weren'T Going to Be Able to to 
 Get Anything More Out of Either of Them: All We Could Do do 
 Was Make for the Pillar of Divinity and Try to Learn More 
 About Visitants THERE on OUR OWN.

94.text:
We Learned That Aerynn and Tyris Came from 1000 Years in the 
 Future, with the Goal of Banishing Aberractions. THEY TOLD 
 Us that aberrationS Distort Space and Time Just by EXISTING, 
 And that the Distortions WOULD EVENTUALLY Go on to Destroy 
 The World. However, They Learnyd They Could Adds the 
 ISSUE by Banishing The Aberractions Before They Got Too Large. 
 That, it seems, is what led the travel back in time. 
 However, Time Travel is a highly confidential Matter, and so 
 THEY DELIVERED us an ultimatum: Cooperate with the in their 
 Mission, or Die. Both for OUR SAKES and FOR THE PLANET's, 
 We Had No Choice But to Help Them. THEY BOWED THEIR HEADS 
 In Respony to Our Answer, Presumable Regretful ABOUT THE 
 Position They Put us in. So Now We're Part of the Mission 
 To save The World — And Tyris Is Festival 'Latest "LACKEY" After 
 Being Tricked by Her.

95.text:
============================================= 

 Tyris Spoke to Aerynn While She Worked on Repairing the 
 Omnistrobe. From the Conversation, I Learned That 
 People WHO TIME TRAVELED TO A TIME PERIOD WERE ONCE 
 CALLED VISITANTS by The PEOPLE OF THAT TIME PERIOD. 
 It Seems Aeryn CAN SENSE VISITANTS by FLUCTUATIONS 
 In Their Flux —But StrangeLy, She Couldn't Sense 
 Any search fluctuation in mine. Could Melroth Have 
 BEEN WRONG ABOUT ME? After Fixing and Activating the 
 Omnistrobe, It Detected a Strange Reading in the 
 Montegnor Valley. After Handing Me An Omnistrobe 
 Handset for Contacting Them, and Information US That 
 THEY WOULD HEAD ON AHEAD SURVEY THE AREA as they 
 DID, AERYN and Tyris Left.

96.text:
====================================== was 

 Tyris Thanked Us for OURP in Banishing the Aberration and Again Again Again APOLOGIZED FORAT THAT HAD HAPPENED. 
 BeeN Easy on Her. IF The Future is to Be Saved, Aeryn Needs to 
 Banish the aberractions. That woold be difficle enoUGH a task 
 EVEN WITHOUT VOLDIGEN STANDING IN OUR WAY ... According to 
 Tyris, Voldigen Himself is Also An Aberration, and Can Absorb The Power OFERRATIONS TO Increase His Own. THEM, He WILL END UP DESTROYING THE WORLD in THEIR PLACE. After Learning All Of 
 THIS, We PROMISED ONCE TO AID THEM in SAVING THE WORLD.

 Feste SeeMs to be well Acquainted with the Owner, WHO PEOPLE

153.text:
=============== 

 SuppaseDly This City's Name Is Asterliese, and It's the Largest

 In "Giant Dragon's Nail Scars", I found some traces of a ritual using Imagine. 
 The flow of the engram is starting to be disturbed, and if left unchecked, the monster of the Giant Dragon's Nail may rampage and attack the surrounding towns and villages. 
 I will cancel the ritual for me. In the meantime, can you calm "<Value Type =" EnemyName "ID =" [SQ103_236_ENEMY1] "/"/> "? 
 It should be okay with the way Slaft taught me ... 
 Please, thank you. 

 ◆ Subjugation target (place to appear) 
 <Value Type = "EnemyName" ID = "[sq103_236_enemy1]" [sq103_236_num1]

455.text:
You're me! It's a masquietta. 
 I'm dealing with those who are a little annoying. 
 I want to defeat the two "Value Type =" EnemyName "id =" [sq103_237_enemy1] ""/> ", but if you don't defeat them at the same time, you'll be repaired. 
 The timing is matched here, so why not defeat the guy in "Tomoshi Fire Forest"? 
 I'll make the other bumpy. I asked! 

 ◆ Subjugation target (place to appear) 
 <Value Type = "EnemyName" ID = "[SQ103_237_Enemy1]" [SQ103_237_NUM1] Body (Tomoshi no Forest)

456.text:
Senior Blitz Lancer Carant! Are you doing your best? 
 I'm collecting ingredients for medicine at the request. Everyone is running around, but there are so many types and they are so excited. 
 I want you to help you! Can you ask? 
 I want you to deliver "Yosaiishi" that can be collected at "Boruom Ruins". 
 There's a strong monster there, and we have to be bundled. I can't afford that now. 
 Would you like to be asked to help people? Please! 

 ◆ Collection target (where you can get) 
 Yosaiishi [SQ103_238_NUM1] Individuals (Bolum Ruins / Free Exploration) / Mineral

486.text:
Hi! Is the adventure going well? 
 My name is Varren. My partner is Carnella. 
 The person who uses the collector "King Collector"! 
 My husband is now looking for something fluffy and soft. 
 It seems that "cotton hair crystal" has come to a pin, and it is gathering. 
 If you like, wouldn't you help me too? 
 There are many thanks! Hacher!

487.text:
Hacher! "King Collector", Varren! 
 It's irresistible, fluffy of "cotton hair crystal". 
 That's it! I'm going to be my husband and try to challenge the original fashion using "cotton hairstytes"! 
 Can you help me with collecting "cotton hairstytes"?

488.text:
Hacher! "King Collector", Varren! 
 "King collector" "Cotton hairstytes" cushion is also packed. 
 I need the ultimate fabric that wraps the finest fluffy! 
 I have to lend the adventurer's power here. 
 Cooperate to fulfill your husband's fluffy dream! I'll ask, Hacher!
